name: Don't die in dungeons
description:
NEW MODE COMES OUT
Princess save the hero.The mode is super hard.The hero was captured instead of princess.Princess wears martial attire to save her hero.But,she's physical strength is limited.She need to rest when fighting.

FEATURES:
* Freely to upgrade all attributes
* Energy mode
* Double jump

One day,a lovely princess was imprisoned in dungeon by Duke Dracula.
Brave man! The king want you to bring her back.

But,dungeons are very danger!
There are horrible monsters and wicked creatures.

You should go deep into dungeons to kill them.
You need to upgrade your weapons by collecting booty.

The most important is that don't die in dungeon!

Features:
*Seven worlds
*Boss Battle
*Random Dungeon
*RPG Style Weapon and Equipment
*Nightmare Mode
*Game Controller Supported

How to play the game?
*Press your keyboard to move your hero.
*Press A to attack.
*Press B to jump.
*You can recover Hit Point by priest.
*You can buy weapon and equipment by merchant.
*You can collect coins and booty in dungeon.
*You can recover all HP when you level up.
